special_text:
[+1]: Up to one target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn.
[-2]: Create two 1/1 white Cleric creature tokens with lifelink.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return any number of target creature cards with total mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.”
